title: Exclusive: Princess Beatrice’s engagement ring designer Shaun Leane on creating her bespoke ring, with a 2.5ct diamond from Botswana
text:
Princess Beatrice and her new fiance, property tycoon Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi, broke with tradition when they announced their engagement by naming the designer who made her ring, a detail most royals keep under wraps.

The platinum and diamond ring was made by British jeweller Shaun Leane, and was designed in close collaboration with Mapelli Mozzi, known as ‘Edo’, who had been introduced to the jeweller by a friend. “I created an engagement ring for a close friend of Edo and he recommended that he came to see me,” reveals Leane, speaking exclusively to Telegraph Luxury.
